titles.title: 086 Who Is He In Yonder Stall

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
F
Who is He in yonder stall
At whose feet
The shepherds fall
Who is He in deep distress
Fasting in the wilderness

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
'Tis the lord
O wondrous story
'Tis the Lord
The King of glory
At His feet we humbly fall
Crown Him crown Him
Lord of all

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Who is He the people bless
For His words of gentleness
Who is He
To whom they bring
All the sick and sorrowing

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Who is He that stands and weeps
At the grave where Lazarus sleeps
Who is He
The gathering throng
Greet with loud
Triumphant song

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Lo at midnight who is He
Prays in dark Gethsemane
Who is He on yonder tree
Dies in grief and agony

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Who is He that from the grave
Comes to heal
And help and save
Who is He
That from His throne
Rules through
All the world alone
